name: FileBox Pro

overview:
FileBox Pro is the file service for creative professionals in music, film, TV industries. Upload your work, then send beautiful emails to you clients and collaborators, with secure one-click downloads and web-based approvals.

  • One-Click Downloads â€“ Your clients download files with one click, no passwords or FTP required

  • User Logins For Your Team â€“ Any collaborator or client can get their own login
  • Granular Security â€“ You control who can see your Projects and FileBoxes, and who can perform certain kinds of actions.
